text: Nakki Lake () is an important tourist attraction and a scared lake in the Republic of India. It is also the national lake of the nation. It is a Hill station, Mahatma Gandhi's ashes were immersed in this Holy Lake on 12 February 1948 and Gandhi Ghat was constructed. Nakki Lake lies in the state of Rajasthan. Category:Lakes of India Category:Rajasthan
title: Lake Nakki
